name: HostAI
headline: The AI operations platform for the built world
description: We’re on a mission to streamline business communication for housing and hospitality. Our integrated AI platform helps property management and hospitality operations automate business workflows so teams can instead focus on the most human elements of their service.

founders.name: Cole Rubin, Founder
founders.description: Real estate entrepreneur. Vacation rental developer/manager & ex real estate PE.

founders.name: Punn Kam, Founder
founders.description: Spawning agents for the built world. ex-Google, family office trader/market-maker.

# The AI support inbox for housing and hospitality
Unify your support channels, automate your messaging, and build a knowledge base that grows with you.
[Book a demo](https://www.hostai.app/<https:/www.hostai.app/demo-form>)[Get started](https://www.hostai.app/<https:/chat.hostai.app/?>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e165dacc629ecd7633f3f8/671f8d983774ae2003e29cb2_HomeHero.avif)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e165dacc629ecd7633f3f8/66e40048c0a5b5e6dac0e404_Group%202224.avif)
The inbox behind thousands of property management operations
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e165dacc629ecd7633f3f8/671f8b593774ae2003e09751_Haven.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e165dacc629ecd7633f3f8/671f8ba1c021fe1c605ba029_Silk.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e165dacc629ecd7633f3f8/671f8b5962311089fca0d88b_BocoBay.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e165dacc629ecd7633f3f8/671f8b59416c08af9ec3c1bd_Arbio.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e165dacc629ecd7633f3f8/671f8b59d81c5dea9224f4c6_FlexLiving.svg)
[Learn more](https://www.hostai.app/<https:/www.hostai.app/demo-form>)
## Bring everything intoone organized platform.
### [Connect your message channels Let customers reach you from anywhere—Email, WhatsApp, Calls, SMS, Live Chat Widget, and more.](https://www.hostai.app/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-0>)### [Plug in your dataOrganize your company’s knowledge across all data sources into one central knowledge base.](https://www.hostai.app/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-1>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e165dacc629ecd7633f3f8/66e95ae33d40d2e06f3b54f8_Frame%201000001923232326.avif)
"We manage all emails sent to info@canbnb.co from HostAI without switching platforms."
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e165dacc629ecd7633f3f8/671c33d528ab760646346420_Jo-Anne.avif)
Jo-Anne Q.
Process and Communication Manager | Canbnb
"Our team handles WhatsApp messages from guests and owners from HostAI."
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e165dacc629ecd7633f3f8/67197d4952eab0c6064a1a5d_Paul.avif)
Paul T.
Operations Director | Silkhaus
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e165dacc629ecd7633f3f8/66e95732580c12e24b53f98f_Ellipse%20515-1.avif)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e165dacc629ecd7633f3f8/66e959443c1ab0bcbb1c3f1f_Iconic%20Mark-%20Main%20Colors%202.avif)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e165dacc629ecd7633f3f8/66e95732d34d2791885c81b7_image%204.avif)
"I love that it connects to my Slack to alert me about urgent messages that need action."
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e165dacc629ecd7633f3f8/6719748d6de9a03559a16711_TylerStellar.webp)
Tyler H.
CEO | StellarDweller 
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e165dacc629ecd7633f3f8/66e95732d88dc2ff085e13d1_image%209.avif)
"HostAI is the first thing we check each day to respond to all our Airbnb messages."
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e165dacc629ecd7633f3f8/67197ecaacdd01c290dcfe15_RachelJozwiack.avif)
Rachel J.
Operations Manager | Koze Rentals
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e165dacc629ecd7633f3f8/66e95ae3076e0bff45a18b54_Frame%201000001926.avif)
"We have year's worth of Notion pages right at our team’s fingertips."
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e165dacc629ecd7633f3f8/671c47dd710782b99c1b3927_Rod.avif)
Rod R.
Partner | VaHouse
"HostAI pulls all the data from our PMS: our saved replies, custom fields, and listing info."
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e165dacc629ecd7633f3f8/671c3252cb1b19589bf06f13_Chrissy.avif)
Chrissy R.
Director of Hospitality | Beckon Homes
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e165dacc629ecd7633f3f8/66e95732c9f7d071d274c8b0_GuestyFavIcon%201.avif)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e165dacc629ecd7633f3f8/66e959443c1ab0bcbb1c3f1f_Iconic%20Mark-%20Main%20Colors%202.avif)

“The property docs in our Google drive now fuel our knowledge base in HostAI.”
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e165dacc629ecd7633f3f8/6722ea2f0d86d60f813de7f6_DAnDeWhip.avif)
Dan W.
Co-Founder | Moxxi Property
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e165dacc629ecd7633f3f8/66e957322cb32d5263ea84b5_Excel.avif)
“All of the data from our Excel sheets are organized and searchable within HostAI. ”
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e165dacc629ecd7633f3f8/671c477cbff7806c2ff6a477_Iuliia.avif)
Iuliia R.
Operations Manager | Arbio
## Build your inbox,  powered by your AI
A modern inbox that lets one support agent do the work of twenty in half the time.
[Learn More](https://www.hostai.app/<https:/www.hostai.app/integrations>)
### AI Messaging
Let AI handle repetitive messages so your team can focus on what matters most.
### Flexible Inboxes
Create dedicated inboxes for each area of your operation, complete with custom tools to support all contacts effectively.
### Conversation Tags
Use AI to tag and prioritize important messages for your team.
### Task Creation
Automatically convert messages and reviews into tasks. Assign, set due dates, and track progress from creation to completion.
### Smart Search
Search across your company’s data sources to find exactly what you need, instantly.
### Upsells
Identify gaps in your calendar and fill them at scale with upsells personalized to every guest.
## Work together to resolve issues fast
A suite of collaboration tools to keep everyone in sync. Built for teams who want to feel like a team.
[Learn More](https://www.hostai.app/<https:/www.hostai.app/demo-form>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e165dacc629ecd7633f3f8/6752e441ffd8a07539cea792_Notes%20\(View%20Thread\)%20.avif)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e165dacc629ecd7633f3f8/6752e3fa74eaebf2c05491d0_Notes%20\(View%20Thread\).avif)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e165dacc629ecd7633f3f8/66e42105aae2fb982baa4d5d_Group%204639.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e165dacc629ecd7633f3f8/670cde49dd81bcb57465a6ef_Right-component.webp)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e165dacc629ecd7633f3f8/670cde7378d803a0337030a6_Williampng.avif)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e165dacc629ecd7633f3f8/673bb8e2c1d61d630f8c7e54_OperationalModeBlur.webp)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e165dacc629ecd7633f3f8/6758133c9793bcd534cd230e_Group%202223.webp)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e165dacc629ecd7633f3f8/6758138f8a51912b5f2ece4f_Frame%201000002086.webp)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e165dacc629ecd7633f3f8/66e40048c0a5b5e6dac0e404_Group%202224.avif)
### Multi-Player
Streamline support in real-time with all of your teammates in one place.
### Notes
Discuss issues in context, coordinate across departments, and move fast.
### Assigning
Review and assign incoming issues, requests, and other unplanned work.
### Insights
Track resolution times, response quality, and progress over time.
## Powering the next generation of customer service teams
[](https://www.hostai.app/<#>)[](https://www.hostai.app/<#>)
"We previously had 12 virtual assistants performing tasks of messages, phone call, triage, updating listings and so on. We've managed to shrink our labour footprint to 4 virtual assistants. These guys know how to ship features...fast."
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e165dacc629ecd7633f3f8/671973b8d7c3f16647ca7e0d_Darren-Square.webp)
Darren M.
MyEasyBnb | 190 Properties
"HostAI has transformed our business and operations. We have improved our response times and message quality. The best solution. No question."
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e165dacc629ecd7633f3f8/671973c8162426fe01713414_Jordan.webp)
Jordan L.
Haven Vacations | 248 Properties
"A lifesaver! My response time is way faster now and guests are happy. It's customizable and able to answer to common questions so I don't have to repeat the same thing over and over."
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e165dacc629ecd7633f3f8/6719748d6de9a03559a16711_TylerStellar.webp)
Tyler H.
StellarDweller | 86 Listings
“Within 30 days of integrating, HostAI is already handling over 80% of our guest communication. I highly recommend."
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e165dacc629ecd7633f3f8/6719746734a788fbbf9e6ef8_AlTech.webp)
Al S.
Rather Be Properties | 41 Listings
"We used to spend so much time resolving miscommunications across multiple systems. They've built a suite of tools that does it all. Working with the team has been a standout."
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e165dacc629ecd7633f3f8/671973d239b806d0168ebfba_Sergiu.webp)
Sergiu L.
Qult | 21 Listings
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66e165dacc629ecd7633f3f8/670ce4f0a036d2a83f1c49ca_Grid_2.svg)

generated_description:
**HostAI: Revolutionizing Communication in Housing and Hospitality**

Founded in 2024 and based in San Francisco, HostAI is on a transformative mission to streamline how businesses in the built world—like housing and hospitality—handle communication. As part of Y Combinator’s W24 batch, the company has set out to automate business workflows, allowing teams to focus on delivering exceptional human experiences instead of getting bogged down by repetitive tasks.

**What They Do**

At its core, HostAI provides an integrated AI operations platform designed specifically for property management and hospitality operations. Picture this: an AI-driven support system that unifies various communication channels—be it email, WhatsApp, SMS, or calls—into one manageable inbox. This means that whether you’re dealing with guest inquiries or property management tasks, you can handle everything efficiently from a single platform.

HostAI’s system smartly manages messaging through features like AI-generated responses, task automation, and intelligent sorting of messages, enabling a single support agent to deliver the performance of twenty. It’s not just about managing inquiries; it’s about leveraging data to enhance service quality and speed-up operations.

**The Team**

Currently a compact team of seven, HostAI benefits from the guidance of Pete Koomen, a Group Partner at Y Combinator. This lean structure allows the company to iterate quickly and adapt to the needs of its users, enhancing the platform's capabilities continuously.

**Why It Matters**

The platform underscores a key trend: businesses need to be agile and responsive to stay competitive. With HostAI, property managers and hospitality professionals can bring everything into one organized system, making it easier to improve response times and enhance customer satisfaction. According to users, the transition to using HostAI has led to substantial improvements in operational efficiency and quality of service, providing a clear competitive edge.

From automating replies to integrating data across various sources, HostAI promises to transform how customer support operates in the property sector. It’s not just about enhancing workflows; it's about redefining how teams connect with their customers.

For anyone in the housing or hospitality industries who is tired of juggling different apps and communication channels, HostAI represents a compelling solution to consider. If you're intrigued, you can check them out at [HostAI](https://www.hostai.app/).
